Package stind

package stind
  • Class
    Description
    ErrorHandler
     
    Result<T,S extends Exception>
    Type which allows for error handling and error propagation, similar to Rust's Result type. It is intended to avoid the usage of try/catch statements, and instead makes use of the ErrorHandler interface and lambda expressions.
    STIND
    Simple InputStream wrapper that aims to simplify input operations
